title: Why isn't there any turret saftety with yasuos ultimate
body: So... why isn't there any turret safety with yasuo ultimate?

replies.body: There used to be. Then Riot took it away because it was the most unfun thing ever.

Nope, that shit still here, from my game 3 days ago.
